title: The Logics of Individual Medvedev Frames
abstract:
Let $n$-Medvedev's logic $\mathbf{ML}_n$ be the intuitionistic logic of
Medvedev frames based on the non-empty subsets of a set of size $n$, which we
call $n$-Medvedev frames. While these are tabular logics, after characterizing
$n$-Medvedev frames using the property of having at least $n$ maximal points,
we offer a uniform axiomatization of them through a Gabbay-style rule
corresponding to this property. Further properties including compactness,
disjunction property, and structural completeness of $\mathbf{ML}_n$ are
explored and compared to those of Medvedev's logic $\mathbf{ML}$.
